meanings.definition: The act of replanting trees in an area where they have been cut down or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: Reafforestation is crucial for maintaining a healthy environment.
meanings.sent2: The community came together to support the reafforestation of the local park.
meanings.sent3: After the storm, the town organized a reafforestation event to bring back the greenery.
meanings.sent4: The reafforestation efforts were like a blanket of hope covering the barren land.
meanings.sent5: The children learned about reafforestation and its impact on wildlife.

meanings.definition: The process of restoring a forest by planting trees in an area where they have been removed.
meanings.sent1: The reafforestation project aimed to bring back the lost forest.
meanings.sent2: Many volunteers joined hands to speed up the reafforestation process.
meanings.sent3: The squirrels in the forest were surprised by the reafforestation activities.
meanings.sent4: The reafforestation was a symphony of new life growing in the once barren land.
meanings.sent5: The reafforestation efforts transformed the landscape into a green paradise.
